articles.title: Anthropic says most AI models, not just Claude, will resort to blackmail

articles.summary: Several weeks after Anthropic released research claiming that its Claude Opus 4 AI model resorted to blackmailing engineers who tried to turn the model off in controlled test scenarios, the company is out with new research suggesting the problem is more widespread among leading AI models.

articles.title: AI at light speed: How glass fibers could replace silicon brains

articles.summary: At Qlik Connect 2025, the spotlight rested extensively on cutting-edge developments and partnerships in data and AI. Subsequently, it turned to inclusion, mentorship and the future of women in data, examining the current state of affairs and proffering areas of improvement.

articles.title: How a 30-year-old techno-thriller predicted our digital isolation
articles.titleJa: どのように30-年-古い techno-thriller predicted our digital isolation
articles.summary: In April, Mark Zuckerberg, as tech billionaires are so fond of doing these days, pontificated at punishing length on a podcast. In the interview, he addressed America’s loneliness epidemic: “The average American has—I think it’s fewer than three friends.
articles.summaryJa: でApril, マーク Zuckerberg, としてtech billionaires are そのため fond のdoing these days, pontificated でpunishing length でpodcast. でinterview, he 対処した America’s loneliness epidemic: “average American has—I 考える it’s fewer than three friends.

articles.title: Artificial Intelligence at CVS Health

articles.title: It’s pretty easy to get DeepSeek to talk dirty
articles.titleJa: It’s かなり 簡単な に取得 DeepSeek に話す 汚い
articles.summary: AI companions like Replika are designed to engage in intimate exchanges, but people use general-purpose chatbots for sex talk too, despite their stricter content moderation policies. Now new research shows that not all chatbots are equally willing to talk dirty: DeepSeek is the easiest to convince.
articles.summaryJa: AI companions 好む Replika are 設計された にengage でintimate exchanges, しかし people 使用 一般的な-purpose chatbots のためのsex 話す も, にもかかわらず それらのstricter コンテンツ moderation policies. 今 新しい 研究 示す そのnot すべての chatbots are 等しく willing に話す 汚い: DeepSeek is easiest にconvince.

articles.title: New methods boost reasoning in small and large language models
articles.titleJa: 新しい methods boost reasoning で小さい と大きい language models

articles.titleJa: AI その書く climate-friendly cement recipes でseconds

articles.summaryJa: AI researchers でSwitzerland have 発見した 方法 にdramatically カット cement s carbon footprint によってredesigning そのrecipe. それらのシステム simulates thousands のingredient combinations, pinpointing those その保つ cement 強力な while emitting far より少ない CO2 すべての でseconds.

articles.title: Toward understanding and preventing misalignment generalization
articles.titleJa: Toward understanding とpreventing misalignment generalization

articles.title: How to Combine Scikit-learn, CatBoost, and SHAP for Explainable Tree Models
articles.titleJa: どのようににCombine Scikit-学習, CatBoost, とSHAP のためのExplainable Tree Models
articles.summary: Machine learning workflows often involve a delicate balance: you want models that perform exceptionally well, but you also need to understand and explain their predictions.
articles.summaryJa: 機械 学習 workflows しばしば involve 繊細な balance: you 望む models そのperform exceptionally 良い, しかし you また 必要 にunderstand とexplain それらのpredictions.
